text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Come here to sign in～! Please look for your name on the list and confirm～!

text_block_list.name: Participating Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Uhhm…… there it is. Haa～, I'm seriously nervous.

text_block_list.name: Participating Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: Aren't you my escort? Just relax. Also, looks like there's something different planned this year. Should be fun?

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: The changing rooms are over there! We will also have rentals available, so if you're interested, please ask a committee member!

text_block_list.name: Participating Uma Musume C
text_block_list.text: ——hey. uhm～～……excuse me, uh. Uhm, I'd like to rent a dress please……

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Oh, sorry. Alright, can you write your name here——

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ～～～～! ! Finally! I'm so hype～～! ! Let's have a lot of fun! !

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Yes. Please keep that exact passion up. I shall do the same.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hehe, best date is ours. Let me escord you ♡ Umm, right…… ahem.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: My lady…… may I have this dance?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Say he～ey! Say ho～o? Say he～ey! Say Woa↑oh↑!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: C'mon y'all put yo hands up! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Let's go karaoke dance time! Go on shout and clap your hands!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Your MC is～ me of course! And～ my lady! !
